name: GIGACHONKER (GameMeow)
description:
Become the dreaded GIGACHONKER and wreak havoc in this satisfying arcade romp!

Features:

  • Unleash GIGACHONKER upon the city and wreak as much havoc as you can before the timer runs out. 
  • Play through several handcrafted levels depicting busy cities and streets as you crush, smash, and punch your way to the ultimate high score. 
  • Every single object in the game is destructible, from huge skyscrapers to tiny mailboxes!
  • Strategize the best way to level the city. Combo streaks grant score multipliers, and you earn bonus time the more damage you cause!

How chonky will your score be?

Note: The desktop version of this game is not code signed. As a result, you may see a security warning the first time you run the game if you are not using the itch.io desktop app.
